name: virtual one on one makeup lesson
description: This is a one on one lesson done on yourself via FaceTime or Zoom. This lesson teaches you how to get a perfect soft everyday glam. My tips, tricks and products used will be shared. Products are provided by you.

name: full glam makeup application
description: Includes, brow fill, flawless foundation,contour/ bronzer, highlight, blush lip color and natural eyeshadow of choice. Strip lashes of choice will also be included.

name: daily set rate
description: This is my price for an 8 hour day varies depending on how many people and what needs to be done. OT is $100 per hour. Half day is $600. Please email shashafaces@gmail.com to inquire.

name: one on one makeup lesson
description: This is a one on one lesson done on yourself. This lesson teaches you how to get a perfect soft everyday glam. My tips, tricks and products used will be shared. Products are provided by you.

name: bridal consultation
description: The bride will choose the perfect look for the wedding based on color schemes and accessories. Eyeshadow options are endless; from a sparkly to a simple and sultry look the choice is yours.

name: bridal makeup
description: Please call or email shashafaces@gmail to book this service.

name: bridal party
description: This price varies based on the location of wedding and the size of bridal party. Please call or email shashafaces@gmail.com to provide more information and book.

name: house call/travel fee
description: $60 flat rate within 10 miles of Hollywood. $1.75 per mile both ways for anything over the 10 mile radius
